```
      "enum": ["takendown", "suspended", "deleted", "deactivated", "desynchronized", "throttled"]
    },
    "rev": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Optional field, the current rev of the repo, if active=true",
      "format": "tid"
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: AT Protocol Label Definition Schema
DESCRIPTION: JSON Schema defining the structure for label metadata tags on AT Protocol resources. Includes fields for version, source, URI, value, timestamps and signatures.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/chat-bsky-convo-get-convo.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "ver": {"type": "integer"},
  "src": {
    "type": "string",
    "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.",
    "format": "did"
  },
  "uri": {
    "type": "string", 
    "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.",
    "format": "uri"
  },
  "cid": {
    "type": "string",
    "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.",
    "format": "cid"
  },
  "val": {
    "type": "string",
    "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.",
    "maxLength": 128
  },
  "neg": {
    "type": "boolean",
    "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."
  },
  "cts": {
    "type": "string",
    "description": "Timestamp when this label was created.",
    "format": "date-time"
  },
  "exp": {
    "type": "string",
    "description": "Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).",
    "format": "date-time"
  },
  "sig": {
    "type": "string",
    "format": "byte",
    "description": "Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."
  }
}
```

TITLE: API Parameter Schema Definition
DESCRIPTION: Schema definition for required and optional parameters when querying the getLikes endpoint including uri, cid, limit and cursor parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/app-bsky-feed-get-likes.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
parameters:
  - name: uri
    in: query
    description: AT-URI of the subject (eg, a post record).
    required: true
    schema:
      type: string
      format: at-uri
  - name: cid
    in: query
    description: CID of the subject record (aka, specific version of record), to filter likes.
    required: false
    schema:
      type: string
      format: cid
  - name: limit
    in: query
    required: false
    schema:
      type: integer
      minimum: 1
      maximum: 100
      default: 50
  - name: cursor
    in: query
    required: false
    schema:
      type: string
```

TITLE: Successful atproto Repository Record Creation Response Schema (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: JSON schema for the response body when successfully creating a new record in an atproto repository. Includes the URI and CID of the created record, as well as optional commit metadata and validation status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/com-atproto-repo-create-record.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["uri", "cid"],
  "properties": {
    "uri": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "at-uri"
    },
    "cid": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "cid"
    },
    "commit": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["cid", "rev"],
      "properties": {
        "cid": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "cid"
        },
        "rev": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "tid"
        }
      },
      "title": "com.atproto.repo.defs.commitMeta"
    },
    "validationStatus": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["valid", "unknown"]
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Request Body Schema for Template Update
DESCRIPTION: JSON schema defining the required and optional fields for updating a communication template, including template ID, name, language, content, subject and other metadata.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-communication-update-template.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["id"],
  "properties": {
    "id": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "ID of the template to be updated."
    },
    "name": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Name of the template."
    },
    "lang": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Message language.",
      "format": "language"
    },
    "contentMarkdown": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Content of the template, markdown supported, can contain variable placeholders."
    },
    "subject": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Subject of the message, used in emails."
    },
    "updatedBy": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "DID of the user who is updating the template.",
      "format": "did"
    },
    "disabled": {
      "type": "boolean"
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Delete Settings Request Schema
DESCRIPTION: JSON schema for the request body when removing Ozone settings options. Requires an array of setting keys (as NSIDs) and a scope specifier.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-setting-remove-options.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["keys", "scope"],
  "properties": {
    "keys": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "string",
        "format": "nsid"
      },
      "maxItems": 200
    },
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["instance", "personal"]
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Response Schema for Successful tools.ozone.set.querySets Request
DESCRIPTION: The JSON schema for a successful response from the tools.ozone.set.querySets endpoint. It returns an array of set objects with properties including name, description, size, and timestamps, along with an optional cursor for pagination.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-set-query-sets.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["sets"],
  "properties": {
    "sets": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "required": ["name", "setSize", "createdAt", "updatedAt"],
        "properties": {
          "name": {
            "type": "string",
            "minLength": 3,
            "maxLength": 128
          },
          "description": {
            "type": "string",
            "maxLength": 10240
          },
          "setSize": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "createdAt": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "date-time"
          },
          "updatedAt": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "date-time"
          }
        },
        "title": "tools.ozone.set.defs.setView"
      }
    },
    "cursor": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining JSON Schema for ATProto Verification State in JSON
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the JSON schema for an ATProto verification state object. It includes properties for verifications, verified status, and trusted verifier status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/app-bsky-actor-get-profile.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "description": "Represents the verification information about the user this object is attached to.",
  "required": ["verifications", "verifiedStatus", "trustedVerifierStatus"],
  "properties": {
    "verifications": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "description": "An individual verification for an associated subject.",
        "required": ["issuer", "uri", "isValid", "createdAt"],
        "properties": {
          "issuer": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The user who issued this verification.",
            "format": "did"
          },
          "uri": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The AT-URI of the verification record.",
            "format": "at-uri"
          },
          "isValid": {
            "type": "boolean",
            "description": "True if the verification passes validation, otherwise false."
          },
          "createdAt": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Timestamp when the verification was created.",
            "format": "date-time"
          }
        },
        "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationView"
      }
    },
    "verifiedStatus": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The user's status as a verified account.",
      "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
    },
    "trustedVerifierStatus": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The user's status as a trusted verifier.",
      "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
    }
  },
  "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationState"
}
```

```
                                "ver":{"type":"integer"},
                                "src":{"type":"string","description":"DID of the actor who created this label.","format":"did"},
                                "uri":{"type":"string","description":"AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.","format":"uri"},
                                "cid":{"type":"string","description":"Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.","format":"cid"},
                                "val":{"type":"string","description":"The short string name of the value or type of this label.","maxLength":128},
                                "neg":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."},
                                "cts":{"type":"string","description":"Timestamp when this label was created.","format":"date-time"},
                                "exp":{"type":"string","description":"Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).","format":"date-time"},
                                "sig":{"type":"string","format":"byte","description":"Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."}
                              },
                              "title":"com.atproto.label.defs.label"
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining Bluesky API Response Schema for User Profiles in JSON
DESCRIPTION: This schema defines the structure of a Bluesky API response for user profile data. It includes properties for user identification, profile details, follower/following counts, associated features, and viewer-specific information. The schema also defines sub-objects for verification status, labels, and list views.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/app-bsky-actor-get-profile.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "200": {
    "description": "OK",
    "content": {
      "application/json": {
        "schema": {
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["did", "handle"],
          "properties": {
            "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"},
            "handle": {"type": "string", "format": "handle"},
            "displayName": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 640},
            "description": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 2560},
            "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
            "banner": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
            "followersCount": {"type": "integer"},
            "followsCount": {"type": "integer"},
            "postsCount": {"type": "integer"},
            "associated": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "lists": {"type": "integer"},
                "feedgens": {"type": "integer"},
                "starterPacks": {"type": "integer"},
                "labeler": {"type": "boolean"},
                "chat": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": ["allowIncoming"],
                  "properties": {
                    "allowIncoming": {"type": "string", "enum": ["all", "none", "following"]}
                  },
                  "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociatedChat"
                }
              },
              "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociated"
            },
            "joinedViaStarterPack": {
              "type": "object",
              "required": ["uri", "cid", "record", "creator", "indexedAt"],
              "properties": {
                "uri": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"},
                "record": {},
                "creator": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": ["did", "handle"],
                  "properties": {
                    "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"},
                    "handle": {"type": "string", "format": "handle"},
                    "displayName": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 640},
                    "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
                    "associated": {"$ref": "#/properties/associated"},
                    "viewer": {"$ref": "#/properties/viewer"}
                  }
                },
                "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"}
              }
            },
            "viewer": {
              "type": "object",
              "description": "Metadata about the requesting account's relationship with the subject account. Only has meaningful content for authed requests.",
              "properties": {
                "muted": {"type": "boolean"},
                "mutedByList": {"$ref": "#/definitions/listViewBasic"},
                "blockedBy": {"type": "boolean"},
                "blocking": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                "blockingByList": {"$ref": "#/definitions/listViewBasic"},
                "following": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                "followedBy": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                "knownFollowers": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "description": "The subject's followers whom you also follow",
                  "required": ["count", "followers"],
                  "properties": {
                    "count": {"type": "integer"},
                    "followers": {
                      "type": "array",
                      "items": "circular(app.bsky.actor.defs.profileViewBasic)",
                      "maxItems": 5
                    }
                  },
                  "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.knownFollowers"
                }
              },
              "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.viewerState"
            },
            "labels": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {"$ref": "#/definitions/label"}
            },
            "verification": {
              "type": "object",
              "description": "Represents the verification information about the user this object is attached to.",
              "required": ["verifications", "verifiedStatus", "trustedVerifierStatus"],
              "properties": {
                "verifications": {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {"$ref": "#/definitions/verificationView"}
                },
                "verifiedStatus": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "The user's status as a verified account.",
                  "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
                },
                "trustedVerifierStatus": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "The user's status as a trusted verifier.",
                  "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
                }
              },
              "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationState"
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Response Schema for Successful Set Operation

```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["name", "setSize", "createdAt", "updatedAt"],
  "properties": {
    "name": {
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 3,
      "maxLength": 128
    },
    "description": {
      "type": "string",
      "maxLength": 10240
    },
    "setSize": {
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "createdAt": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "updatedAt": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining Error Response Schemas for Session Refresh in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON schema definitions for error responses of the session refresh endpoint. Includes schemas for bad request and unauthorized errors with specific error codes and messages.

CODE:
```
{
  "400": {
    "content": {
      "application/json": {
        "schema": {
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["error", "message"],
          "properties": {
            "error": {
              "type": "string",
              "enum": ["InvalidRequest", "ExpiredToken", "InvalidToken", "AccountTakedown"]
            },
            "message": {"type": "string"}
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "401": {
    "content": {
      "application/json": {
        "schema": {
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["error", "message"],
          "properties": {
            "error": {"const": "AuthMissing"},
            "message": {"type": "string"}
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining Moderation Event Schema in JSON for Bluesky API
DESCRIPTION: This JSON schema defines the structure for moderation events in the Bluesky API. It includes various event types such as takedowns, acknowledgments, reports, and labeling. The schema specifies required properties, allowed values, and nested object structures for each event type.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-moderation-emit-event.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "required": true,
  "content": {
    "application/json": {
      "schema": {
        "type": "object",
        "required": ["event", "subject", "createdBy"],
        "properties": {
          "event": {
            "oneOf": [
              {
                "type": "object",
                "description": "Take down a subject permanently or temporarily",
                "properties": {
                  "comment": {"type": "string"},
                  "durationInHours": {"type": "integer"},
                  "acknowledgeAccountSubjects": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "If true, all other reports on content authored by this account will be resolved (acknowledged)."
                  },
                  "policies": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {"type": "string"},
                    "maxItems": 5
                  }
                },
                "title": "tools.ozone.moderation.defs.modEventTakedown"
              },
              // ... [other event types omitted for brevity]
            ]
          },
          "subject": {
            "oneOf": [
              {
                "type": "object",
                "required": ["did"],
                "properties": {
                  "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"}
                },
                "title": "com.atproto.admin.defs.repoRef"
              },
              {
                "type": "object",
                "required": ["uri", "cid"],
                "properties": {
                  "uri": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                  "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"}
                },
                "title": "com.atproto.repo.strongRef"
              }
            ]
          },
          "subjectBlobCids": {
            "type": "array",
            "items": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"}
          },
          "createdBy": {"type": "string", "format": "did"}
        }
      }
```

TITLE: Querying Record Details with Ozone Moderation API
DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves details about specified records using their URIs. It accepts an array of at-uri formatted strings (up to 100 items) and returns record information. The endpoint is part of the Ozone moderation service APIs and requires proper authentication.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-moderation-get-records.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// Example usage of tools.ozone.moderation.getRecords endpoint
// Requires authentication and proper URI formatting

const getRecords = async (uris) => {
  // Ensure uris is an array of at-uri formatted strings
  // Maximum of 100 items allowed
  
  const params = new URLSearchParams();
  uris.forEach(uri => params.append('uris', uri));
  
  const response = await fetch(`https://bsky.social/xrpc/tools.ozone.moderation.getRecords?${params}`, {
    method: 'GET',
    headers: {
      'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
    }
  });
  
  return await response.json();
};

// Example call
getRecords([
  'at://did:plc:abcdef/app.bsky.feed.post/123',
  'at://did:plc:ghijkl/app.bsky.feed.post/456'
]).then(data => console.log(data));
```

```
    "description": "OK",
```

```
        "schema": {
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["did", "role"],
          "properties": {

            "disabled": {"type": "boolean"},

              "type": "object",
              "required": ["did", "handle"],
```

TITLE: Defining API Schema for Moderation System

```
  "properties": {
    "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"},
    "handle": {"type": "string", "format": "handle"},
    "email": {"type": "string"},

    "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},

      "type": "object",
      "properties": {

              "type": "string",

      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining Actor Profile View Schema in JSON for Bluesky API
DESCRIPTION: This JSON schema defines the structure for an actor's profile view in the Bluesky social network API. It includes details such as the actor's handle, display name, description, avatar, labels, and verification status. The schema also specifies response formats for successful requests and various error conditions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/app-bsky-actor-search-actors.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["actor"],
  "properties": {
    "actor": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["did", "handle"],
      "properties": {
        "did": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "did"
        },
        "handle": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "handle"
        },
        "displayName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 640
        },
        "description": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 2560
        },
        "avatar": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        "indexedAt": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        },
        "labels": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["src", "uri", "val"],
            "properties": {
              "src": {
                "type": "string",
                "format": "did"
              },
              "uri": {
                "type": "string",
                "format": "cid"
              },
              "val": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.",
                "maxLength": 128
              },
              "neg": {
                "type": "boolean",
                "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."
              },
              "cts": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "Timestamp when this label was created.",
                "format": "date-time"
              },
              "exp": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).",
                "format": "date-time"
              },
              "sig": {
                "type": "string",
                "format": "byte",
                "description": "Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."
              }
            },
            "title": "com.atproto.label.defs.label"
          }
        },
        "verification": {
          "type": "object",
          "description": "Represents the verification information about the user this object is attached to.",
          "required": ["verifications", "verifiedStatus", "trustedVerifierStatus"],
          "properties": {
            "verifications": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "type": "object",
                "description": "An individual verification for an associated subject.",
                "required": ["issuer", "uri", "isValid", "createdAt"],
                "properties": {
                  "issuer": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The user who issued this verification.",
                    "format": "did"
                  },
                  "uri": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The AT-URI of the verification record.",
                    "format": "at-uri"
                  },
                  "isValid": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "True if the verification passes validation, otherwise false."
                  },
                  "createdAt": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Timestamp when the verification was created.",
                    "format": "date-time"
                  }
                },
                "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationView"
              }
            },
            "verifiedStatus": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "The user's status as a verified account.",
              "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
            },
            "trustedVerifierStatus": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "The user's status as a trusted verifier.",
              "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
            }
          },
          "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationState"
        }
      },
      "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileView"
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining JSON Schema for Bluesky API Response
DESCRIPTION: This schema defines the structure for API responses in the Bluesky social network. It includes detailed specifications for messages, user profiles, facets (such as mentions and hashtags), embeds, and labels. The schema also covers user interactions like following, blocking, and muting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/chat-bsky-convo-remove-reaction.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1

```
        "schema": {
          "type": "object",

            "message": {
              "type": "object",
              "required": ["id", "rev", "text", "sender", "sentAt"],
              "properties": {
                "id": {"type": "string"},
                "rev": {"type": "string"},
                "text": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 10000},
                "facets": {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "Annotation of a sub-string within rich text.",
                    "required": ["index", "features"],
                    "properties": {
                      "index": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Specifies the sub-string range a facet feature applies to. Start index is inclusive, end index is exclusive. Indices are zero-indexed, counting bytes of the UTF-8 encoded text. NOTE: some languages, like Javascript, use UTF-16 or Unicode codepoints for string slice indexing; in these languages, convert to byte arrays before working with facets.",
                        "required": ["byteStart", "byteEnd"],
                        "properties": {
                          "byteStart": {"type": "integer", "minimum": 0},
                          "byteEnd": {"type": "integer", "minimum": 0}
                        },
                        "title": "app.bsky.richtext.facet.byteSlice"
                      },
                      "features": {
                        "type": "array",
                        "items": {
                          "oneOf": [

                              "required": ["did"],
```

DESCRIPTION: JSON schema for error responses from the getValues endpoint. Includes 400 (Bad Request) with various error types such as InvalidRequest or SetNotFound, and 401 (Unauthorized) when authentication is missing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-set-get-values.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
// 400 Bad Request
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["error", "message"],
  "properties": {
    "error": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["InvalidRequest", "ExpiredToken", "InvalidToken", "SetNotFound"]
    },
    "message": {"type": "string"}
  }
}

// 401 Unauthorized
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["error", "message"],
  "properties": {
    "error": {"const": "AuthMissing"},
    "message": {"type": "string"}
  }
}
```

TITLE: JSON Schema Definition for Bluesky Protocol Components
DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive schema definitions for Bluesky protocol elements including label definitions, list viewer states, actor profiles, verifications and rich text facets. The schema enforces data validation rules and defines required properties, formats and constraints for each component.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/chat-bsky-convo-get-log.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "label": {
    "type": "object",
    "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
    "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
    "properties": {
      "ver": {"type": "integer"},
      "src": {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.",
        "format": "did"
      },
      "uri": {
        "type": "string", 
        "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource",
        "format": "uri"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining Bluesky API Response Schema for Muted Users in JSON
DESCRIPTION: This schema defines the structure of responses from the Bluesky API when retrieving muted users. It includes detailed type definitions for pagination, user profiles, and relationship metadata such as blocking and following status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/app-bsky-graph-get-mutes.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "200": {
    "description": "OK",
    "content": {
      "application/json": {
        "schema": {
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["mutes"],
          "properties": {
            "cursor": {"type": "string"},
            "mutes": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": ["did", "handle"],
                "properties": {
                  "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"},
                  "handle": {"type": "string", "format": "handle"},
                  "displayName": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 640},
                  "description": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 2560},
                  "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
                  "associated": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "lists": {"type": "integer"},
                      "feedgens": {"type": "integer"},
                      "starterPacks": {"type": "integer"},
                      "labeler": {"type": "boolean"},
                      "chat": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": ["allowIncoming"],
                        "properties": {
                          "allowIncoming": {"type": "string", "enum": ["all", "none", "following"]}
                        },
                        "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociatedChat"
                      }
                    },
                    "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociated"
                  },
                  "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},
                  "createdAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},
                  "viewer": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "Metadata about the requesting account's relationship with the subject account. Only has meaningful content for authed requests.",

                        "type": "object",
                        "required": ["uri", "cid", "name", "purpose"],

                          "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"},
                          "name": {"type": "string", "minLength": 1, "maxLength": 64},
                          "purpose": {
                            "oneOf": [
                              {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "token",
                                "description": "A list of actors to apply an aggregate moderation action (mute/block) on.",
                                "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.modlist"
                              },
                              {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "token",

                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "token",
                                "description": "A list of actors used for only for reference purposes such as within a starter pack.",
                                "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.referencelist"
                              }
                            ],
                            "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.listPurpose"
                          },
                          "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
                          "listItemCount": {"type": "integer", "minimum": 0},
                          "labels": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
                              "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
                              "properties": {
                                "ver": {"type": "integer"},
                                "src": {"type": "string", "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.", "format": "did"},
                                "uri": {"type": "string", "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.", "format": "uri"},
                                "cid": {"type": "string", "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.", "format": "cid"},
                                "val": {"type": "string", "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.", "maxLength": 128},
                                "neg": {"type": "boolean", "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."},
                                "cts": {"type": "string", "description": "Timestamp when this label was created.", "format": "date-time"},
                                "exp": {"type": "string", "description": "Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).", "format": "date-time"},
                                "sig": {"type": "string", "format": "byte", "description": "Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."}
                              },
                              "title": "com.atproto.label.defs.label"
                            }

                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {

                          },
                          "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"}
                        },

                          "purpose": {
                            "oneOf": [
                              {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "token",
                                "description": "A list of actors to apply an aggregate moderation action (mute/block) on.",
                                "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.modlist"
                              },
                              {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "token",

                              },
                              {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "token",
                                "description": "A list of actors used for only for reference purposes such as within a starter pack.",
                                "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.referencelist"
                              }
                            ],
                            "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.listPurpose"
                          },
                          "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
                          "listItemCount": {"type": "integer", "minimum": 0},
                          "labels": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
                              "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
                              "properties": {
                                "ver": {"type": "integer"},
                                "src": {"type": "string", "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.", "format": "did"},

                                "cid": {"type": "string", "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.", "format": "cid"},
                                "val": {"type": "string", "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.", "maxLength": 128},
                                "neg": {"type": "boolean", "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."},
```

TITLE: Request Body Schema for Setting Upsert Option
DESCRIPTION: JSON schema for the request body when creating or updating a setting option. Requires key, scope and value fields. Optional fields include description and managerRole.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-setting-upsert-option.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["key", "scope", "value"],
  "properties": {
    "key": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "nsid"
    },
    "scope": {
      "type": "string", 
      "enum": ["instance", "personal"]
    },
    "value": {},
    "description": {
      "type": "string",
      "maxLength": 2000
    },
    "managerRole": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["tools.ozone.team.defs#roleModerator", "tools.ozone.team.defs#roleTriage", "tools.ozone.team.defs#roleAdmin"]
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Adding Static Headers to XrpcClient Requests
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to add static headers to all requests made by an XrpcClient instance. This approach uses the service configuration object to define static headers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/blog/2024-08-12-ts-api-refactor/index.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { XrpcClient } from '@atproto/xrpc'

const instance = new XrpcClient(
  {
    service: 'http://my-service.com',
    headers: {
      'my-header': 'my-value',
    },
  },
  [
    {
      lexicon: 1,
      id: 'io.example.doStuff',
      defs: {},
    },
  ],
)
```

TITLE: CLI Commands for ATProto Blob Operations
DESCRIPTION: Example CLI commands demonstrating the usage of go-repo-export tool for listing and downloading blobs from an ATProto repository. Shows the output format for both list-blobs and download-blobs commands.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/blog/2023-11-06-repo-export.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
> ./go-repo-export list-blobs atproto.com
bafkreiacrjijybmsgnq3mca6fvhtvtc7jdtjflomoenrh4ph77kghzkiii
bafkreib4xwiqhxbqidwwatoqj7mrx6mr7wlc5s6blicq5wq2qsq37ynx5y
bafkreibdnsisdacjv3fswjic4dp7tju7mywfdlcrpleisefvzf44c3p7wm
bafkreiebtvblnu4jwu66y57kakido7uhiigenznxdlh6r6wiswblv5m4py
[...]

> ./go-repo-export download-blobs atproto.com
writing blobs to: did:plc:ewvi7nxzyoun6zhxrhs64oiz/_blob
did:plc:ewvi7nxzyoun6zhxrhs64oiz/_blob/bafkreiacrjijybmsgnq3mca6fvhtvtc7jdtjflomoenrh4ph77kghzkiii  downloaded
did:plc:ewvi7nxzyoun6zhxrhs64oiz/_blob/bafkreib4xwiqhxbqidwwatoqj7mrx6mr7wlc5s6blicq5wq2qsq37ynx5y  downloaded
did:plc:ewvi7nxzyoun6zhxrhs64oiz/_blob/bafkreibdnsisdacjv3fswjic4dp7tju7mywfdlcrpleisefvzf44c3p7wm  downloaded
[...]
```

TITLE: API Endpoint Definition for getMutes
DESCRIPTION: OpenAPI/Swagger definition for the getMutes endpoint, specifying query parameters for pagination including limit and cursor.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/app-bsky-graph-get-mutes.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
name: "limit"
in: "query"
required: false
schema:
  type: "integer"
  minimum: 1
  maximum: 100
  default: 50
---
name: "cursor"
in: "query"
required: false
schema:
  type: "string"
```

TITLE: HTTP 401 Response with DPoP Nonce Error
DESCRIPTION: Example HTTP 401 Unauthorized response when a DPoP nonce is missing or outdated. The server returns a WWW-Authenticate header with an error value of 'use_dpop_nonce' and provides the current nonce value in the DPoP-Nonce header.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/advanced-guides/oauth-client.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: http
CODE:
```
HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized
WWW-Authenticate: DPoP error="use_dpop_nonce", error_description="Resource server requires nonce in DPoP proof"
DPoP-Nonce: eyJ7S_zG.eyJH0-Z.HX4w-7v
```

TITLE: GET Request to tools.ozone.set.getValues Endpoint
DESCRIPTION: Defines the API endpoint for retrieving a specific set and its values. Required query parameter is 'name' to specify which set to retrieve. Optional parameters include 'limit' (default 100, max 1000) and 'cursor' for pagination.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-set-get-values.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: api
CODE:
```
GET /xrpc/tools.ozone.set.getValues
```

TITLE: Retrieving Moderation Event Details via HTTP GET
DESCRIPTION: Sends a GET request to retrieve details about a specific moderation event. Requires authentication and the event ID as a query parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-moderation-get-event.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: HTTP
CODE:
```
GET /xrpc/tools.ozone.moderation.getEvent?id=123 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.example.com
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN
```

TITLE: Response Schema for Setting Option
DESCRIPTION: JSON schema for the successful response containing the created/updated setting option. Includes required fields like key, value, did, scope and audit fields.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-setting-upsert-option.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["option"],
  "properties": {
    "option": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["key", "value", "did", "scope", "createdBy", "lastUpdatedBy"],
      "properties": {
        "key": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "nsid"
        },
        "did": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "did"
        },
        "value": {},
        "description": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 10240
        },
        "createdAt": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        },
        "updatedAt": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        },
        "managerRole": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["tools.ozone.team.defs#roleModerator", "tools.ozone.team.defs#roleTriage", "tools.ozone.team.defs#roleAdmin"]
        },
        "scope": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["instance", "personal"]
        },
        "createdBy": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "did"
        },
        "lastUpdatedBy": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "did"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```
                              "handle": {"type": "string", "format": "handle"},

                              "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
                              "associated": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "properties": {

                                  "feedgens": {"type": "integer"},
                                  "starterPacks": {"type": "integer"},

                                    "properties": {
                                      "allowIncoming": {"type": "string", "enum": ["all", "none", "following"]}
                                    },
                                    "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociatedChat"
                                  }
                                },
                                "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociated"
                              },
                              "viewer": "circular(app.bsky.actor.defs.viewerState)",
                              "labels": {
                                "type": "array",
                                "items": {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
                                  "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
                                  "properties": {
                                    "ver": {"type": "integer"},
                                    "src": {"type": "string", "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.", "format": "did"},
                                    "uri": {"type": "string", "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.", "format": "uri"},
                                    "cid": {"type": "string", "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.", "format": "cid"},
                                    "val": {"type": "string", "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.", "maxLength": 128},
                                    "neg": {"type": "boolean", "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."},
                                    "cts": {"type": "string", "description": "Timestamp when this label was created.", "format": "date-time"},
                                    "exp": {"type": "string", "description": "Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).", "format": "date-time"},
                                    "sig": {"type": "string", "format": "byte", "description": "Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."}
                                  },
                                  "title": "com.atproto.label.defs.label"
                                }
                              },
                              "createdAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},
                              "verification": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "description": "Represents the verification information about the user this object is attached to.",
                                "required": ["verifications", "verifiedStatus", "trustedVerifierStatus"],
                                "properties": {
                                  "verifications": {
                                    "type": "array",
                                    "items": {
                                      "type": "object",
                                      "description": "An individual verification for an associated subject.",
                                      "required": ["issuer", "uri", "isValid", "createdAt"],
                                      "properties": {
                                        "issuer": {"type": "string", "description": "The user who issued this verification.", "format": "did"},
                                        "uri": {"type": "string", "description": "The AT-URI of the verification record.", "format": "at-uri"},
                                        "isValid": {"type": "boolean", "description": "True if the verification passes validation, otherwise false."},
                                        "createdAt": {"type": "string", "description": "Timestamp when the verification was created.", "format": "date-time"}
                                      },
                                      "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationView"
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "verifiedStatus": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The user's status as a verified account.",
                                    "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
                                  },
                                  "trustedVerifierStatus": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The user's status as a trusted verifier.",
                                    "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
                                  }
                                },
                                "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationState"
                              }
                            },
                            "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileViewBasic"
                          },
                          "maxItems": 5
                        }
                      },
                      "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.knownFollowers"
                    }
                  },
                  "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.viewerState"
                },
                "labels": {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
                    "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
                    "properties": {
                      "ver": {"type": "integer"},
                      "src": {"type": "string", "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.", "format": "did"},
                      "uri": {"type": "string", "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.", "format": "uri"},

                      "val": {"type": "string"
```

TITLE: Defining Bluesky API Response Schema in JSON
DESCRIPTION: This schema defines the structure of API responses for the Bluesky social network. It includes detailed specifications for records, blobs, labels, moderation actions, and repository information. The schema is comprehensive and covers various aspects of content management and moderation in the network.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/docs/api/tools-ozone-moderation-get-records.api.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: JSON
CODE:
```
{
  "200": {
    "description": "OK",
    "content": {
      "application/json": {
        "schema": {
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["records"],
          "properties": {
            "records": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "oneOf": [
                  {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": ["uri", "cid", "value", "blobs", "indexedAt", "moderation", "repo"],
                    "properties": {
                      "uri": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                      "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"},
                      "value": {},
                      "blobs": {
                        "type": "array",
                        "items": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "required": ["cid", "mimeType", "size", "createdAt"],
                          "properties": {
                            "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"},
                            "mimeType": {"type": "string"},
                            "size": {"type": "integer"},
                            "createdAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},
                            "details": {
                              "oneOf": [
                                {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "required": ["width", "height"],
                                  "properties": {
                                    "width": {"type": "integer"},
                                    "height": {"type": "integer"}
                                  },
                                  "title": "tools.ozone.moderation.defs.imageDetails"
                                },
                                {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "required": ["width", "height", "length"],
                                  "properties": {
                                    "width": {"type": "integer"},
                                    "height": {"type": "integer"},
                                    "length": {"type": "integer"}
                                  },
                                  "title": "tools.ozone.moderation.defs.videoDetails"
                                }
                              ]
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      },
                      "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},
                      "moderation": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "properties": {
                          "subjectStatus": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "required": ["id", "subject", "createdAt", "updatedAt", "reviewState"],
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {"type": "integer"},
                              "subject": {
                                "oneOf": [
                                  {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "required": ["did"],
                                    "properties": {"did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"}},
                                    "title": "com.atproto.admin.defs.repoRef"
                                  },
                                  {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "required": ["uri", "cid"],
                                    "properties": {
                                      "uri": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                                      "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"}
                                    },
                                    "title": "com.atproto.repo.strongRef"
                                  }
                                ]
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      },
                      "repo": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": ["did", "handle", "relatedRecords", "indexedAt", "moderation"],
                        "properties": {
                          "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"},
                          "handle": {"type": "string", "format": "handle"},
                          "email": {"type": "string"},
                          "relatedRecords": {"type": "array", "items": {}},
                          "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"}
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                ]
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Using Agent Type for Function Parameters in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the new Agent type as a parameter type in functions. This ensures compatibility with future OAuth agent implementations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/blog/2024-08-12-ts-api-refactor/index.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { Agent } from '@atproto/api'

async function doStuffWithAgent(agent: Agent, arg: string) {
  return agent.resolveHandle(arg)
}
```

```
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time"
                          }
                        },
                        "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.listViewBasic"
                      },
                      "following": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "at-uri"
                      },
                      "followedBy": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "at-uri"
                      },
                      "knownFollowers": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "The subject's followers whom you also follow",
                        "required": ["count", "followers"],
                        "properties": {
                          "count": {
                            "type": "integer"
                          },
                          "followers": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": ["did", "handle"],
                              "properties": {
                                "did": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "did"
                                },
                                "handle": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "handle"
                                },
                                "displayName": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "maxLength": 640
                                },
                                "avatar": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "uri"
                                },
                                "associated": {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "properties": {
                                    "lists": {
                                      "type": "integer"
                                    },
                                    "feedgens": {
                                      "type": "integer"
                                    },
                                    "starterPacks": {
                                      "type": "integer"
                                    },
                                    "labeler": {
                                      "type": "boolean"
                                    },
                                    "chat": {
                                      "type": "object",
                                      "required": ["allowIncoming"],
                                      "properties": {
                                        "allowIncoming": {
                                          "type": "string",
                                          "enum": ["all", "none", "following"]
                                        }
                                      },
                                      "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociatedChat"
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociated"
                                },
                                "viewer": "circular(app.bsky.actor.defs.viewerState)",
                                "labels": {
                                  "type": "array",
                                  "items": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
                                    "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
                                    "properties": {
                                      "ver": {
                                        "type": "integer"
                                      },
                                      "src": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.",
                                        "format": "did"
                                      },
                                      "uri": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.",
                                        "format": "uri"
                                      },
                                      "cid": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.",
                                        "format": "cid"
                                      },
                                      "val": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.",
                                        "maxLength": 128
                                      },
                                      "neg": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."
                                      },
                                      "cts": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "Timestamp when this label was created.",
                                        "format": "date-time"
                                      },
                                      "exp": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).",
                                        "format": "date-time"
                                      },
                                      "sig": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "format": "byte",
                                        "description": "Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."
                                      }
                                    },
                                    "title": "com.atproto.label.defs.label"
                                  }
                                },
                                "createdAt": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "date-time"
                                },
                                "verification": {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "description": "Represents the verification information about the user this object is attached to.",
                                  "required": ["verifications", "verifiedStatus", "trustedVerifierStatus"],
                                  "properties": {
                                    "verifications": {
                                      "type": "array",
                                      "items": {
                                        "type": "object",
                                        "description": "An individual verification for an associated subject.",
                                        "required": ["issuer", "uri", "isValid", "createdAt"],
                                        "properties": {
                                          "issuer": {
                                            "type": "string",
                                            "description": "The user who issued this verification.",
                                            "format": "did"
                                          },
                                          "uri": {
                                            "type": "string",
                                            "description": "The AT-URI of the verification record.",
                                            "format": "at-uri"
                                          },
                                          "isValid": {
                                            "type": "boolean",
                                            "description": "True if the verification passes validation, otherwise false."
                                          },
                                          "createdAt": {
                                            "type": "string",
                                            "description": "Timestamp when the verification was created.",
                                            "format": "date-time"
                                          }
                                        },
                                        "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationView"
                                      }
                                    },
                                    "verifiedStatus": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "description": "The user's status as a verified account.",
                                      "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
                                    },
                                    "trustedVerifierStatus": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "description": "The user's status as a trusted verifier.",
                                      "enum": ["valid", "invalid", "none"]
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.verificationState"
                                }
                              },
                              "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileViewBasic"
                            },
                            "maxItems": 5
                          }
                        },
                        "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.knownFollowers"
                      }
                    },
                    "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.viewerState"
                  },
                  "labels": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
                      "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
                      "properties": {
                        "ver": {
                          "type": "integer"
                        },
                        "src": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.",
                          "format": "did"
                        },
                        "uri": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.",
                          "format": "uri"
                        },
                        "cid": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to."
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining Bluesky API Schema Components
DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive JSON schema that defines the structure and validation rules for various Bluesky API components including profile views, embeddings, verification states, and labels. LANGUAGE: json
CODE:

```
{
  "type": "object",
  "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
  "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
  "properties": {
    "ver": {"type": "integer"},
    "src": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.",
      "format": "did"
    },
    "uri": {
      "type": "string", 
      "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.",
      "format": "uri"
    },
    "cid": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.",
      "format": "cid"
    },
    "val": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.",
      "maxLength": 128
    },
    "neg": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."
    },
    "cts": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Timestamp when this label was created.",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "exp": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "sig": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "byte",
      "description": "Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Defining ATProto Profile and List Schemas in JSON
DESCRIPTION: This extensive JSON schema defines various components of the ATProto ecosystem, including profile views, list definitions, label structures, and viewer states. It covers properties such as DIDs, handles, display names, avatars, and interaction states between users.

```
{
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["uri", "cid", "did", "creator", "displayName", "indexedAt"],
  "properties": {
    "uri": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
    "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"},
    "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"},
    "creator": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["did", "handle"],
      "properties": {
        "did": {"type": "string", "format": "did"},
        "handle": {"type": "string", "format": "handle"},
        "displayName": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 640},
        "description": {"type": "string", "maxLength": 2560},
        "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
        "associated": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "lists": {"type": "integer"},
            "feedgens": {"type": "integer"},
            "starterPacks": {"type": "integer"},
            "labeler": {"type": "boolean"},
            "chat": {
              "type": "object",
              "required": ["allowIncoming"],
              "properties": {
                "allowIncoming": {"type": "string", "enum": ["all", "none", "following"]}
              },
              "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociatedChat"
            }
          },
          "title": "app.bsky.actor.defs.profileAssociated"
        },
        "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},
        "createdAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"},
        "viewer": {
          "type": "object",
          "description": "Metadata about the requesting account's relationship with the subject account. Only has meaningful content for authed requests.",
          "properties": {
            "muted": {"type": "boolean"},
            "mutedByList": {
              "type": "object",
              "required": ["uri", "cid", "name", "purpose"],
              "properties": {
                "uri": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"},
                "name": {"type": "string", "minLength": 1, "maxLength": 64},
                "purpose": {
                  "oneOf": [
                    {"type": "string", "format": "token", "description": "A list of actors to apply an aggregate moderation action (mute/block) on.", "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.modlist"},
                    {"type": "string", "format": "token", "description": "A list of actors used for curation purposes such as list feeds or interaction gating.", "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.curatelist"},
                    {"type": "string", "format": "token", "description": "A list of actors used for only for reference purposes such as within a starter pack.", "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.referencelist"}
                  ],
                  "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.listPurpose"
                },
                "avatar": {"type": "string", "format": "uri"},
                "listItemCount": {"type": "integer", "minimum": 0},
                "labels": {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).",
                    "required": ["src", "uri", "val", "cts"],
                    "properties": {
                      "ver": {"type": "integer"},
                      "src": {"type": "string", "description": "DID of the actor who created this label.", "format": "did"},
                      "uri": {"type": "string", "description": "AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.", "format": "uri"},
                      "cid": {"type": "string", "description": "Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.", "format": "cid"},
                      "val": {"type": "string", "description": "The short string name of the value or type of this label.", "maxLength": 128},
                      "neg": {"type": "boolean", "description": "If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label."},
                      "cts": {"type": "string", "description": "Timestamp when this label was created.", "format": "date-time"},
                      "exp": {"type": "string", "description": "Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).", "format": "date-time"},
                      "sig": {"type": "string", "format": "byte", "description": "Signature of dag-cbor encoded label."}
                    },
                    "title": "com.atproto.label.defs.label"
                  }
                },
                "viewer": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "muted": {"type": "boolean"},
                    "blocked": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"}
                  },
                  "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.listViewerState"
                },
                "indexedAt": {"type": "string", "format": "date-time"}
              },
              "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.listViewBasic"
            },
            "blockedBy": {"type": "boolean"},
            "blocking": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
            "blockingByList": {
              "type": "object",
              "required": ["uri", "cid", "name", "purpose"],
              "properties": {
                "uri": {"type": "string", "format": "at-uri"},
                "cid": {"type": "string", "format": "cid"},
                "name": {"type": "string", "minLength": 1, "maxLength": 64},
                "purpose": {
                  "oneOf": [
                    {"type": "string", "format": "token", "description": "A list of actors to apply an aggregate moderation action (mute/block) on.", "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.modlist"},
                    {"type": "string", "format": "token", "description": "A list of actors used for curation purposes such as list feeds or interaction gating.", "title": "app.bsky.graph.defs.curatelist"},
                    {"type": "string", "format": "token", "description": "A list of actors used for only for reference purposes such as within a starter"}
                  ]
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Using validate* Utility Methods for Data Validation
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows the updated signature of validate* utility methods. It demonstrates how these methods can be used to validate data against a particular schema and properly type the result.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/bsky-docs/blob/main/blog/2025-02-13-typescript-sdk-release.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { AppBskyEmbedImages } from '@atproto/api'

// Aliased for clarity
const Images = AppBskyEmbedImages.Main
const validateImages = AppBskyEmbedImages.validateMain

// Get some data somehow
declare const data: unknown

// Validate the data against a particular schema (images here)
const result = validateImages(data)

if (result.success) {
  // The `value` property was previously typed as `unknown`
  // and is now properly typed as `Image`
  const images = result.value
}
```
